entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Divergent behavior of byte `&` operator #107062
  • [API Proposal]: New NumberStyles: SignedHexNumber and SignedBinaryNumber #107052
  • SslStream intermittently returns zero byte read mid-stream in net8.0 #107051
  • [API Proposal]: Determine if a Generic Math type belongs to certain type categories #107047
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree->TypeIs(varDsc->TypeGet(), genActualType(varDsc)) ... #107045
    10.0.0
  • Make specifying just `DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory` only search in assembly directory #107040
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add CancellationTokenSource.CancelAfter overload that accepts TimeProvider #107034
  • IndexOutOfRangeException thrown by NullabilityInfoContext.Create(PropertyInfo) #107033
  • Chinese Lunisolar Calendar conversion table discrepancy for the year 2057 #107032
    Future
  • build.sh should support a --with-system-libs flag like the VMR #107031
    10.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] Libraries tests failed to build on Helix due to missing `System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.*` files #107029
    9.0.0
  • Crash when NullReferenceException occurs in background thread on x64 #107026
  • Exception System.InvalidOperationException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107025
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regression in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Basic on 8/19/2024 8:38:43 PM #107044
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions in System.Text.Tests.Perf_StringBuilder #107042
  • [API Proposal]: x64 `CLDEMOTE` Intrinsics #107022
  • source-built NativeAOT doesn't work with system brotli #107020
    10.0.0
  • Unix CI assets are not downloadable; unlike Windows #107019
  • Idle thread timeout rules for thread pools #107017
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentDictionary.Clear(bool noResize) #107016
  • How to deal with traffic bursts #107013
  • Test failure:JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_39424/Runtime_39424/Runtime_39424.cmd #107008

Closed

  • Huge memory consumption by process "wasm-opt" when publishing aot .net 7 preview 6 #73069
  • Single-file host's version information is incorrect #41640
    Future
  • SqlString comparison regression bug #99507
  • Incorrect IL2059 for `RunClassConstructor` on any `System.Nullable<T>` instantiation #106939
    10.0.0
  • Enable relevant thread pool events in Windows #87020
  • Assert in JIT running diagnostics tests #107055
  • Allow custom TState to be passed into Linq Extension methods to prevent closures #107010
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 8/17/2024 12:12:18 AM #106708
  • Failure in HostActivation.Tests.MultiArchInstallLocation.EnvironmentVariable_DotnetRootPathDoesNotExist #72891
    Future
  • Test failure in XmlSerializerTests.Xml_DerivedIXmlSerializable #107043
  • `CertificateRequest.CreateSelfSigned` fails on macOS Sequoia #106775
    9.0.0
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid app crashes on connected device after splash screen, but works on simulator #105421
    9.0.0
  • Argument type mismatch error while running asp.net benchmark with net6.0. #106855
  • DataView does not unescape sort strings #85367
  • [API Proposal]: Having negative indices for indexing from the end and wrapping / circular indexing from a starting index #106919
  • System.Text.Json: Calling Write method of default dictionary converter from a custom dictionary converter fails with NRE #106697
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tailcall/mutual_recursion/mutual_recursion.cmd #106603
    9.0.0
  • [ODBC] SSL_read error coming when calling a table valued function #94170
  • RegisteredWaitHandle.Portable.cs + UnregisterPortableCore #106930
    Future
  • Spread element on initialized inline array throws AccessViolationException #107018
  • DataView does not escape property names #85365
  • DataRows SetModified and SetAdded is not the same between the code and the document #103157
  • Performance delay when filtering a DataTable using the DefaultView.RowFilter property #106061
  • [API Proposal]: "*App*" wildcard for [UnsafeAccessor] assembly name #106216
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update NativeImageEagerFixups lock acquiredbefore #107064
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make host error message include pointer to architecture for Windows library load failure with ERROR_BAD_EXE_FORMAT #107063
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport Azure Linux test changes #107061
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] New cert loader should load into CNG by default #107060
    area-System.Security
  • Respect JitEnableOptionalRelocs in TryReserveInitialMemory #107059
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames from debugdebugger #107058
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix calling property setter In in the Configuration source generator #107057
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Fix JIT/SPMI CodeQL issues #107056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that Vector128.CreateSequence works on x86 for non-constant 64-bit inputs #107053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure the layout of `StackAllocatedBox<T>` matches boxed layouts #107050
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate CoreCLRConfiguration for cross-subset builds #107049
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix libraries fuzzing pipeline #107048
    needs-area-label, 10.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #107046
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #107041
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Fix RunClassConstructor trim warning for Nullable<T> #107039
    needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Correct lengths of Chinese lunisolar calendar months 8 and 9 in 2057. #107038
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test on Alpine #107035
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Performance sample - remove public nugets and clean up #107030
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra][android] Fix Android helix queue name #107023
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • check in configurations #107012
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check CancellationToken before TimeSpan in TimeProviderTaskExtensions #107009
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution

Merged

  • [cDAC] Fix getting instantiation type handles for generic subclasses #107014
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • New cert loader should load into CNG by default #107005
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Fix LinkAttributes example docs #107054
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix RunClassConstructor trim warning for Nullable<T> #106975
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix object.GetType dataflow edge case #106909
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update Azure Linux tag names #106884
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that Arm64 correctly handles multiplication of simd by a 64-bit scalar #106972
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Set GC metrics to zero prior to first GC #107004
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Fix `CndSel(AllTrue, op2, op3) -> op2` "next" node return #106971
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Preserve range check for HW intrinsics with non-const/out-of-range immediates #107006
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106576
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move some members only needed for `AppDomain` off of `BaseDomain` #107015
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #106973
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Use FeatureSwitchDefinition in a few places #106564
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Code cleanup: Remove TODO in assertionprop regarding optVNConstantPropOnJTrue removin trees twice #106976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix storage of stack trace of exception from reflection #106901
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] improve UCO sample and WBT #106632
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Code cleanup: Replace TODO with Note in assertionprop regarding using a precise range for IntegralRange #106982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Disable mutual_recursion F# test under GC stress #106968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #106981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, blocked, test-enhancement
  • Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #106994
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Split identifier calculation from code context and bind marshallers to the code context #106846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Backport Azure Linux test changes #106980
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Stop counting work items from ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue for ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount #106854
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/9.0] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #106993
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix up docs #106563
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2525440 #106995
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] Allow side-effects for the first test in switch recognition #106988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add a public test version of the superpmi-collect pipeline #106960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink: fix TypeProxy implementation of equality #106990
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2525339 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [wip][mono][infra] Increase timeout for fullAOT jobs #106955
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WASI] WasiEventLoop to keep Task alive #106633
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Define a merged runner for the nativeaot subtree and run every test out-of-proc and don't reference the xunit generator #107002
    test-enhancement, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [WASI] HTTP client testing #105838
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • BinaryFormatter tests should be skipped only on AOT, WASM and Mobile #106858
    area-System.Runtime, test-enhancement, binaryformatter-migration
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Added additional tests for generic attributes. #106745
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Extend timeout when waiting for service status #106998
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Implement getClassAssemblyName #106959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tensor Operation fixes when input is sliced (non-contiguous) #106985
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: heap corruption #1984
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Compilation failure with async/EH/lock #2641
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question]: Should GCPointerMap have a provision for adding optional fields to GCStaticEETypeNode #2606

Updated

  • No stringToNewUTF8 #2669
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Post-merge tasks #2472

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable the official build for Linux #2673
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Move thread stack top and bottom from thread locals to `thread` class #2672
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pre-relocate WASM function indices #2661
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Static Web Assets] DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints throws ArgumentException due to duplicate key #43033
  • `dotnet format style` fails when requiring .NET Framework Build Host exe #43017
  • Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset download check fails because NuGetPackageRoot is unset in some scenarios #43016

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 p7 zip installed, the prompt message "update are available for the..." should be displayed after running "dotnet workload install maui --skip-manifest-update". #42526
    Discussion
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC1, creating 8.0/6.0 project requires September Servicing (8.0.9/6.0.34) feeds. #42888

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup private feeds for tests #43041
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Explicity set UseConsolidatedMvcViews to false. #43037
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Support --no-restore option in dotnet test #43034
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Define "ToolingPackageVersion" properties for msbuild tooling dependencies #43008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Send supported protocol version to the testing platform #43003
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Put binlog directly into the VMR's #42984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Update SBRP dependency #43012
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable workload search for users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Temporary fix for the cppcli tests #42811
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revert WPF work around when we merge RC1 SDK #74923
    17.12
  • The JSON-RPC connection with the remote party was lost before the request could complete. #74916
  • Diagnostic severity code fix should not show for custom severity configurable diagnostics #74913

Closed

  • RegisterHostOutputs #74753
  • Nullable field warnings are missing when using struct primary constructors #74726
    17.12
  • Interceptors still require `InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces` property #74511
    17.12
  • Visual Studio does not reload source generator assemblies when they change on disk #48083
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35226.156 #74912
  • IDE0270 creates invalid code #74460
    Backlog
  • Rename session randomly dismisses itself #74347

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix broken url #74924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: readonly backing field #74922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add tests validating a particular scenario #74921
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use collection expressions #74920
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler for copilot related documents #74918
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make in memory assemblies in InteractiveAssemblyLoader can be collected when use scripting #74915
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Avoid synthesizing incorrect `allows ref struct` delegate type parameters #74914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add required `--locale` option to BuildHost #74910
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix NRE in rename #74909
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74919
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update field keyword feature name and details #74671
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #74917
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report nullable ctor warnings for struct primary constructors #74844
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • update configs for snap #74904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use InterceptorsNamespaces feature name instead of InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces #74865
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add explicit cast to UseCoalesceExpressionForIfNullStatementCheckCodeFixProvider #74471
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Double check document changes when dismiss rename #74905
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove last custom ref test assemblies #74880
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Snap for 17.12 P2 #74908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Always take ownership from UIThreadContext when rename commit #74889
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] per-file content exclusion #74903
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix copilot options default value handling #74867
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial work to create a service for returning related documents for copilot purposes. #74906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix typo in incremental-generators.cookbook.md #74642
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Fix allow ref like types for synthesized TypeParameterSymbols in Ad-Hoc Delegates #74714
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Add `IAnalyzerAssemblyResolver` public API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tuples are not supported by Url.RouteUrl() #57556
  • Retry `E2ETest.ServerExecutionTests.CircuitTests.ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit` #57551
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57550
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_middleware, single_query #57549
  • [API Proposal]: Add `CorsPolicyBuilder.AllowAnyExposedHeader` #57546
  • Bad Request - Request Too Long - IIS Server #57545
  • allow configure static files with `IOptions<T>` and `IConfiguration` #57544
  • Perf regression: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57543
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57542
  • I would like to ask if I can provide a WPF blazor Webapp application template #57541

Closed

  • Breaking change for IdentityRole object not documented #57427
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Flakey test POST_ServerAbort_ClientReceivesAbort #53294
    Test failures
  • Retry CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesFromMultipleConnectionsWithSameUser #55954
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json_middleware #57534
  • Validate local development workflows in CI #56237
    9.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Activate InteractiveServer/InteractiveWebAssembly as soon as possible during StreamRender #57525
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext #57496
  • Blazor Server - Input element is not re-rendered. #57510

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Invoke inbound activity handlers on circuit initialization #57557
    area-blazor
  • Unquarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.EventTest.Cancel_CanTrigger` #57555
    area-blazor
  • Fix `InjectedStartup_DefaultApplicationNameIsEntryAssembly` #57554
    area-hosting
  • Retry `ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit` #57552
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix `BlazorWebJsInitializersTest` #57548
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Breaking change fix for IdentityRole.ConcurrencyStamp to initialize with new Guid. #57553
    area-identity, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Remove some tests from helix retry list #57539
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Validate local development scenarios in CI #57492
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine Http3RequestTests.POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57533
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Unquarantine EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry #57376
    area-blazor
  • bumping ws dependency to fix component vulnerability #57536
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade ws 7 to 7.5.10 #57411
    area-signalr, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57531
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0-rc2

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [test] Method not found Xunit.Sdk.XunitException..ctor #4655
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Disable failing AssemblyLoad_ProducesEvents test #4892

Updated

  • Sync shared (PAL, utilcode, inc, etc.) files with latest runtime #4885

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The FlyoutPage toolbar icon does not work in Android and iOS #24480
  • BindableObjects not getting collected causing memory leak, android #24478
  • Changing view size/layout/position does not update the shadow #24476
  • Vianney app #24475
  • XamlC error : Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') #24472
  • Flyout page in Android does not show flyout button (burger) consistently #24468
  • Scrollview content is not render properly when the 'Don't keep activities' setting is enabled. #24467
  • Unable to set each child Page Title Font of TabbedPage to desired Font when currentPageChanged Event #24463
  • "Cannot access a disposed object" when reading large JSON from Web #24457
  • ListView inside ContentView inside StackLayout: scrolling does not work #24455

Closed

  • [Testing] CollectionViewInfiniteScroll #24148
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Remove code from iOS that short circuits propagation #24477
    area-navigation
  • [net9.0] Update net9 arcade bits #24473
    area-infrastructure
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • Update NavigationPageToolbar.cs #24469
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix App Theme Binding For Non Elements #24465
    community ✨, area-theme
  • [Binding SG] Refactor data models #24462
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Fix item fading when moving between groups in Grouped CollectionView #24461
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • Remove excessive Application API docs #24427
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24474
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [resizetizer] fix a build performance issue #24453
    area-single-project
  • [Testing] CollectionViewInfiniteScroll Conversion to UI Test #24411
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label

Updated

  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [iOS] DatePicker (Format='D') #24296
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix inset adjustment #24344
    area-layout
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2592.51` to `1.0.2651.64` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.5 to 1.5.6 #24328
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fix shadow consistency on Android and iOS #24415
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • [ci] Build public #24388
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled. #24431
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    9.0-rc2
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-image, t/perf

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Checking for null values ​​for parent properties before calling ThenInclude #34548
  • NativeAOT-compiled app doesn't include the compiled model on RC1 #34546
    9.0.0
  • proppery that is datetimeoffset or datetime , function max , min doesnt work on them #34545
  • How to correctly reference other table using EF Core and SQLite? #34543
  • Cosmos: Be able to access response headers #34539
    Backlog

Closed

  • "Unable to cast object of type 'System.String' to type 'System.Int32'" #34521
  • Create foreign key from navigation property #34542
  • Can't connect with Managed Identity and Cosmos provider #34317
  • Test with VB/F# to make sure expression tree differences are handled #14572
    10.0.0
  • Auto-creation of DbSet does not work with F# properties #34356
  • Views migrations in EF-Core migrations? #34530

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Always include generated files in the compilation #34547
    tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34544
  • (RC2) Downgrade to LTS SqlClient #34540
    tell-mode

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Add explicit casts for generated null in method calls. #34523
    tell-mode
  • [release/9.0] Make nested generic type generation consistent #34537
  • Added a test project for F# functional tests. #34541
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34538
  • (RC2) (Test only) Fix async void tests #34529
    tell-mode
